version_description: Fixed mysterious vanishing Game Center button

Fixed rotation display glitch
Fixed explosion sound
Other bug fixes

Fixed a bug that could cause a crash
Other small bug fixes

Sound Engine Rewrite
New inbuilt levels - just run the fields
Bug fixes

Fixed a bug that could cause a crash
Other minor bug fixes

Fixed a bug that could cause a crash
Other small bug fixes

iOS 11 support
Notch embracing
UI Fixed and other bugs fixed

After 10 years, Cube Runner has had a major overhaul!
Its engine has been given a huge boost by moving over to Metal
The menus have been rewritten and simplified
Themes have been added - there are now different blocks and landscapes
You can now fly through blocks or canyons forever with no pressure to beat your last distance with Zen mode
New music by Bjornar Kibsgaard - https://bjokib.com
Lots of other improvements

Oh there is also a new icon!

The return of portrait mode (change this from Settings)!
Updated home screen to allow switching of all levels between day and night
New Custom theme - want sand with classic blocks and arrow ship - you got it! Customise away.
Camera view is now saved across sessions
Sensitivity tweaked a little to make less twitchy
Additional minor bug fixes
